A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have never see anthing like this movie before. TLj has some excellent scenes\, but iT also has plenty of truly awful ones. There are some really great performances overshadowed by A sundry of terrible acting. Tlj offers plenty to like\, however\, there is far more to dislike. For me\, the desecration of Luke Skywalker and the scene where Rose \"saves\" Finn are the two thermal detonators that obliterated this movie.
